pr_title: Calculate min and max ssz lengths

timeline.message: Calculate min and max lengths for SSZ serialized objects.
Move length calculation to a separate class

timeline.author: Nashatyrev

timeline.bodyText: Not sure here: getBitlistElementMaxSizes() seems to return only Bitlist instance sizes in the referred class. Why is it indexed by variableFieldCount which is a total counter of lists and bitfields?
timeline.author: Nashatyrev

replies.bodyText:
That is highly suspicious but exactly matches what SimpleOffsetSerializer does. It also works for every type we know how to SSZ serialise, but I strongly suspect that's a coincidence and there just aren't any objects that have both SSZList and Bitlist.
Created a test class with both and sure enough it fails with IndexOutOfBoundsException.  So have fixed both LengthBoundsCalculator and SimpleOffsetSerializer.
